base_description: Compact, black and silver coffee maker.
part_description: Includes a water reservoir, brew head, drip tray, and control panel. The reservoir is on the left, the brew head in the center, and the control panel on the right.
internal_interaction_description: Water from the reservoir is heated and directed through the brew head. The control panel manages the brewing process, while the drip tray collects excess liquid.
external_interaction_description: The coffee maker interacts with users through the control panel for brewing settings. It requires external power and uses coffee pods placed in the brew head to make coffee.
